trans-unit.source: Simulation
trans-unit.target: Simulation

trans-unit.source: Simulations typically compose multiple forces as desired. This module provides several for your enjoyment:
trans-unit.target: 模拟通常根据需要组成多个力。本模块提供了几种供您欣赏。

trans-unit.source: Since a key function was specified (as the identity function), and the new data contains the numbers [4, 8, 16] which match existing elements in the document, the update selection contains three DIV elements. Leaving those elements as-is, we can append new elements for [1, 2, 32] using the enter selection:
trans-unit.target: 由于指定了一个键函数(作为身份函数),而且新数据包含与文档中现有元素相匹配的数字[4,8,16],更新选择包含三个DIV元素。让这些元素保持原样,我们可以使用回车选择追加[1,2,32]的新元素。

trans-unit.source: Since the contour polygons are GeoJSON, you can transform and display them using standard tools; see d3.geoPath, d3.geoProject and d3.geoStitch, for example. Here the above contours of surface temperature are displayed in the Natural Earth projection:
trans-unit.target: 由于轮廓多边形是GeoJSON，因此您可以使用标准工具对其进行转换和显示。例如，请参见d3.geoPath，d3.geoProject和d3.geoStitch。上面的表面温度等值线显示在“自然地球”投影中：

trans-unit.source: Since the triangulation is computed as the dual of the Voronoi diagram, and the Voronoi diagram is clipped by the extent, a subset of the Delaunay links is returned.
trans-unit.target: 由于三角测量计算为所述双Voronoi图，并且所述Voronoi图被夹由程度，则返回德洛奈链路的子集。

trans-unit.source: Sinusoidal easing; returns sin(t).
trans-unit.target: 正弦缓和；返回sin（t）。

trans-unit.source: Small circles do not follow great arcs and thus the generated polygon is only an approximation. Specifying a smaller precision angle improves the accuracy of the approximate polygon, but also increase the cost to generate and render it.
trans-unit.target: 小圆不遵循大弧度,因此生成的多边形只是一个近似值。指定较小的精度角可以提高近似多边形的精度,但也会增加生成和渲染的成本。

trans-unit.source: Small files are nice, but modularity is also about making D3 more fun. Microlibraries are easier to understand, develop and test. They make it easier for new people to get involved and contribute. They reduce the distinction between a “core module” and a “plugin”, and increase the pace of development in D3 features.
trans-unit.target: 小文件很不错，但是模块化也可以使D3更有趣。微库更易于理解，开发和测试。它们使新人们更容易参与并做出贡献。它们减少了“核心模块”和“插件”之间的区别，并加快了D3功能的开发速度。

trans-unit.source: Some HTML elements have special properties that are not addressable using attributes or styles, such as a form field’s text value and a checkbox’s checked boolean. Use this method to get or set these properties.
trans-unit.target: 一些HTML元素具有无法使用属性或样式进行寻址的特殊属性，例如，表单字段的文本 value 和复选框的 checked 布尔值。使用此方法获取或设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: Some shape types can be stacked, placing one shape adjacent to another. For example, a bar chart of monthly sales might be broken down into a multi-series bar chart by product category, stacking bars vertically. This is equivalent to subdividing a bar chart by an ordinal dimension (such as product category) and applying a color encoding.
trans-unit.target: 有些形状类型可以堆叠,将一个形状与另一个形状相邻。例如,月销售额的条形图可以按产品类别分解为多系列条形图,垂直堆叠条形图。这相当于将条形图按序数维度(如产品类别)进行细分,并应用颜色编码。

trans-unit.source: Some usage patterns in D3 3.x could cause the browser to hang when a background page returned to the foreground. For example, the following code schedules a transition every second:
trans-unit.target: D3 3.x中的一些使用模式可能会导致浏览器在后台页面返回到前景时挂起。例如,下面的代码每隔一秒就会安排一次过渡。

trans-unit.source: Sorting does not affect the order of the generated arc array which is always in the same order as the input data array; it merely affects the computed angles of each arc. The first arc starts at the start angle and the last arc ends at the end angle.
trans-unit.target: 排序不影响生成的弧阵列的顺序，该弧阵列始终与输入数据阵列相同。它仅影响每个圆弧的计算角度。第一个弧线从起始角度开始，最后一个弧线以终止角度结束。

trans-unit.source: Sorts key values for the current key using the specified comparator function, such as d3.ascending or d3.descending. If no comparator is specified for the current key, the order in which keys will be returned is undefined. For example, to sort years in ascending order and varieties in descending order:
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比较器功能对当前键的键值进行排序，例如d3.ascending或d3.descending。如果没有为当前键指定比较器，则返回键的顺序不确定。例如，要以升序对年份进行排序，并以降序对品种进行排序：

trans-unit.source: Sorts leaf elements using the specified comparator function, such as d3.ascending or d3.descending. This is roughly equivalent to sorting the input array before applying the nest operator; however it is typically more efficient as the size of each group is smaller. If no value comparator is specified, elements will be returned in the order they appeared in the input array. This applies to nest.map, nest.entries and nest.object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比较器函数对叶元素进行排序，例如d3.ascending或d3.descending。这大致相当于在应用nest运算符之前对输入数组进行排序；但是，由于每个组的规模较小，因此效率通常更高。如果未指定值比较器，则元素将按照它们在输入数组中出现的顺序返回。这适用于nest .map，nest .entries和nest .object。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the children of this node, if any, and each of this node’s descendants’ children, in pre-order traversal using the specified compare function, and returns this node. The specified function is passed two nodes a and b to compare. If a should be before b, the function must return a value less than zero; if b should be before a, the function must return a value greater than zero; otherwise, the relative order of a and b are not specified. See array.sort for more.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的compare函数以预遍历的方式对该节点的子节点（如果有）以及该节点的每个子节点的子节点进行排序，并返回此节点。将指定的函数传递给两个节点a和b进行比较。如果a应该在b之前，则该函数必须返回小于零的值；否则，返回0。如果b应该在a之前，则该函数必须返回一个大于零的值；否则，不指定a和b的相对顺序。有关更多信息，请参见array .sort。

trans-unit.source: Source
trans-unit.target: Source

trans-unit.source: Specifies a rollup function to be applied on each group of leaf elements. The return value of the rollup function will replace the array of leaf values in either the associative array returned by nest.map or nest.object; for nest.entries, it replaces the leaf entry.values with entry.value. If a leaf comparator is specified, the leaf elements are sorted prior to invoking the rollup function.
trans-unit.target: 指定要应用于每组叶子元素的汇总功能。 rollup函数的返回值将替换nest .map或nest .object返回的关联数组中的叶子值数组；对于巢 .entries，它取代了叶项与.values 进入 .value的。如果指定了叶子比较器，则在调用汇总功能之前对叶子元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the desired aspect ratio of the generated rectangles. The ratio must be specified as a number greater than or equal to one. Note that the orientation of the generated rectangles (tall or wide) is not implied by the ratio; for example, a ratio of two will attempt to produce a mixture of rectangles whose width:height ratio is either 2:1 or 1:2. (However, you can approximately achieve this result by generating a square treemap at different dimensions, and then stretching the treemap to the desired aspect ratio.) Furthermore, the specified ratio is merely a hint to the tiling algorithm; the rectangles are not guaranteed to have the specified aspect ratio. If not specified, the aspect ratio defaults to the golden ratio, φ = (1 + sqrt(5)) / 2, per Kong et al.
trans-unit.target: 指定生成的矩形的所需长宽比。该比率必须指定为大于或等于1的数字。请注意，生成的矩形（高或宽）的方向并不暗含该比率；例如，两个的比率将试图产生其矩形的混合物宽度：高度比为任一2：1或1：2。 （但是，您可以通过生成不同尺寸的正方形树图，然后将树图拉伸到所需的宽高比来大致实现此结果。）此外，指定比例只是对切片算法的提示；矩形不保证具有指定的宽高比。如果未指定，则按照Kong 等人的方法，长宽比默认为黄金比例φ=（1 + sqrt（5））/ 2 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transition easing function for all selected elements. The value must be specified as a function. The easing function is invoked for each frame of the animation, being passed the normalized time t in the range [0, 1]; it must then return the eased time tʹ which is typically also in the range [0, 1]. A good easing function should return 0 if t = 0 and 1 if t = 1. If an easing function is not specified, it defaults to d3.easeCubic.
trans-unit.target: 指定所有选定元素的过渡缓动功能。该值必须指定为函数。为动画的每一帧调用缓动函数，传递的标准化时间t在[0，1]范围内；然后，它必须返回通常也位于[0，1]范围内的缓和时间tʹ。如果一个好的减轻函数应返回0 吨 = 0和1，如果吨 = 1。如果未指定缓和功能，则默认为d3.easeCubic。

trans-unit.source: Specify the default output fill color. Defaults to none.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认的输出填充颜色。默认为 "无"。

trans-unit.source: Specify the default output point radius. Defaults to 4.5.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认的输出点半径。默认值为4.5。

trans-unit.source: Specify the default output stroke color. Defaults to black.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认的输出笔触颜色。默认为黑色。

trans-unit.source: Specify the input character encoding. Defaults to “utf8”.
trans-unit.target: 指定输入字符编码。默认为“ utf8”。

trans-unit.source: Specify the input delimiter character. Defaults to “,” for reading CSV. (You can enter a tab on the command line by typing ⌃V.)
trans-unit.target: 指定输入定界符。默认为“，”以读取CSV。（您可以通过在命令行中输入⌃V来输入一个选项卡。）

trans-unit.source: Specify the output character encoding. Defaults to “utf8”.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出字符编码。默认为“ utf8”。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output delimiter character. Defaults to “,” for writing CSV. (You can enter a tab on the command line by typing ⌃V.)
trans-unit.target: 指定输出定界符。写入CSV时默认为“，”。（您可以通过在命令行中输入⌃V来输入一个选项卡。）

trans-unit.source: Specify the output file name. Defaults to “-” for stdout.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件名。标准输出默认为“-”。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output height. Defaults to 500.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出高度。默认值为500。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output width. Defaults to 960.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出宽度。默认值为960。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the inner radius as a function is useful for constructing a stacked polar bar chart, often in conjunction with a sqrt scale. More commonly, a constant inner radius is used for a donut or pie chart. If the outer radius is smaller than the inner radius, the inner and outer radii are swapped. A negative value is treated as zero.
trans-unit.target: 将内半径指定为函数对于构造堆叠的极坐标图通常很有用，通常与sqrt刻度结合使用。更常见的是，环形图或饼图使用恒定的内半径。如果外半径小于内半径，则将交换内半径和外半径。负值视为零。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the outer radius as a function is useful for constructing a coxcomb or polar bar chart, often in conjunction with a sqrt scale. More commonly, a constant outer radius is used for a pie or donut chart. If the outer radius is smaller than the inner radius, the inner and outer radii are swapped. A negative value is treated as zero.
trans-unit.target: 将外径指定为函数对于构造coxcomb或极坐标条形图很有用，通常与sqrt刻度结合使用。更常见的是，饼图或甜甜圈图使用恒定的外径。如果外半径小于内半径，则将交换内半径和外半径。负值视为零。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the size as a function is useful for constructing a scatterplot with a size encoding. If you wish to scale the symbol to fit a given bounding box, rather than by area, try SVG’s getBBox.
trans-unit.target: 将大小指定为函数对于使用大小编码构造散点图很有用。如果希望缩放符号以适合给定的边界框而不是按面积缩放，请尝试SVG的getBBox。

trans-unit.source: Spherical Math
trans-unit.target: 球面数学

trans-unit.source: Spherical Shapes
trans-unit.target: 球面形状

trans-unit.source: Spherical polygons also require a winding order convention to determine which side of the polygon is the inside: the exterior ring for polygons smaller than a hemisphere must be clockwise, while the exterior ring for polygons larger than a hemisphere must be anticlockwise. Interior rings representing holes must use the opposite winding order of their exterior ring. This winding order convention is also used by TopoJSON and ESRI shapefiles; however, it is the opposite convention of GeoJSON’s RFC 7946. (Also note that standard GeoJSON WGS84 uses planar equirectangular coordinates, not spherical coordinates, and thus may require stitching to remove antimeridian cuts.)
trans-unit.target: 球形多边形还需要绕线顺序约定来确定多边形的哪一侧是内部：小于半球的多边形的外环必须是顺时针方向，而大于半球的多边形的外环必须是逆时针方向。代表孔的内圈必须使用与外圈相反的缠绕顺序。TopoJSON和ESRI shapefile也使用此缠绕顺序约定；但是，这与 GeoJSON的RFC 7946 相反。（还要注意，标准GeoJSON WGS84使用平面等角坐标，而不是球面坐标，因此可能需要缝合 删除antimeridian削减。）

trans-unit.source: Splines
trans-unit.target: Splines

trans-unit.source: Stack Offsets
trans-unit.target: 叠加偏移

trans-unit.source: Stack Orders
trans-unit.target: 堆栈订单

trans-unit.source: Stack offsets are typically not used directly, but are instead passed to stack.offset.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈偏移量通常不直接使用，而是传递给stack .offset。

trans-unit.source: Stack orders are typically not used directly, but are instead passed to stack.order.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈订单通常不直接使用，而是传递给stack .order。

trans-unit.source: Stack shapes, placing one adjacent to another, as in a stacked bar chart.
trans-unit.target: 堆积形状,将一个相邻的形状放置在另一个相邻的形状上,如堆积条形图。

trans-unit.source: Stacked charts can show overall value and per-category value simultaneously; however, it is typically harder to compare across categories, as only the bottom layer of the stack is aligned. So, chose the stack order carefully, and consider a streamgraph. (See also grouped charts.)
trans-unit.target: 堆叠图表可以同时显示总体价值和每个类别的价值；但是，通常很难跨类别进行比较，因为只有堆栈的底层是对齐的。因此，仔细选择堆栈顺序，并考虑一个流图。（另请参阅分组图表。）

trans-unit.source: Stacks
trans-unit.target: Stacks

trans-unit.source: Statistics
trans-unit.target: Statistics

trans-unit.source: Steve Waterman’s butterfly projection.
trans-unit.target: 史蒂夫·沃特曼的蝴蝶投影。

trans-unit.source: Stitches the GeoJSON object in the specified input file, removing antimeridian and polar cuts, and replacing straight Cartesian line segments with geodesic segments. The input object must have coordinates in longitude and latitude in decimal degrees per RFC 7946. Antimeridian cutting, if needed, can then be re-applied after rotating to the desired projection aspect.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的输入文件中缝合GeoJSON对象，删除时线和极地切割，并用测地线段替换直角笛卡尔线段。根据RFC 7946，输入对象必须具有经度和纬度的坐标（以十进制表示）。如果需要，可以在旋转到所需的投影外观后重新应用后院切割。

trans-unit.source: Stops the simulation’s internal timer, if it is running, and returns the simulation. If the timer is already stopped, this method does nothing. This method is useful for running the simulation manually; see simulation.tick.
trans-unit.target: 停止模拟的内部计时器（如果正在运行），然后返回模拟。如果计时器已经停止，则此方法不执行任何操作。该方法对于手动运行仿真很有用。参见模拟 .tick。

trans-unit.source: Stops this timer, preventing subsequent callbacks. This method has no effect if the timer has already stopped.
trans-unit.target: 停止该定时器,防止后续回调。如果定时器已经停止,本方法没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: Stratify
trans-unit.target: Stratify

trans-unit.source: Streams
trans-unit.target: Streams

trans-unit.source: Streams the specified GeoJSONobject to the specified projection stream. While both features and geometry objects are supported as input, the stream interface only describes the geometry, and thus additional feature properties are not visible to streams.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的GeoJSON 对象流传输到指定的投影流。虽然要素和几何对象均受支持，但流接口仅描述几何，因此其他要素属性对流不可见。

trans-unit.source: Sunday-based weeks (e.g., February 5, 2012 at 12:00 AM).
trans-unit.target: 以周日为单位的周(如2012年2月5日上午12:00)。

trans-unit.source: Symbol types are typically not used directly, instead being passed to symbol.type. However, you can define your own symbol type implementation should none of the built-in types satisfy your needs using the following interface. You can also use this low-level interface with a built-in symbol type as an alternative to the symbol generator.
trans-unit.target: 符号类型通常不直接使用，而是传递给symbol .type。但是，如果没有内置类型可以满足您的需求，则可以使用以下接口定义自己的符号类型实现。您也可以将此低级界面与内置符号类型一起使用，以代替符号生成器。

trans-unit.source: Symbols
trans-unit.target: Symbols

trans-unit.source: Symbols provide a categorical shape encoding as is commonly used in scatterplots. Symbols are always centered at ⟨0,0⟩; use a transform (see: SVG, Canvas) to move the symbol to a different position.
trans-unit.target: 符号提供了散点图中通常使用的分类形状编码。符号始终以⟨0,0⟩为中心；使用变换（请参阅：SVG，Canvas）将符号移动到其他位置。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric anticipatory easing; scales backIn for t in [0, 0.5] and backOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称的预期宽松；在[ 0，0.5 ]中缩放backIn为t，在[ 0.5，1 ]中缩放t为t。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric bounce easing; scales bounceIn for t in [0, 0.5] and bounceOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称反弹缓和；秤bounceIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和bounceOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric circular easing; scales circleIn for t in [0, 0.5] and circleOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称循环宽松；秤circleIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和circleOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric cubic easing; scales cubicIn for t in [0, 0.5] and cubicOut for t in [0.5, 1]. Also equivalent to poly.exponent(3).
trans-unit.target: 对称三次缓动；秤CUBICIN用于吨在[0，0.5]和cubicOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。也等于poly。指数（3）。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric elastic easing; scales elasticIn for t in [0, 0.5] and elasticOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称弹性缓和；秤elasticIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和elasticOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric exponential easing; scales expIn for t in [0, 0.5] and expOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称指数宽松；在[ 0，0.5 ]中缩放expIn为t，在[ 0.5，1 ]中缩放expOut为t。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric polynomial easing; scales polyIn for t in [0, 0.5] and polyOut for t in [0.5, 1]. If the exponent is not specified, it defaults to 3, equivalent to cubic.
trans-unit.target: 对称多项式缓动；秤polyIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和polyOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。如果未指定指数，则默认为3，等于三次。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric quadratic easing; scales quadIn for t in [0, 0.5] and quadOut for t in [0.5, 1]. Also equivalent to poly.exponent(2).
trans-unit.target: 对称二次宽松；秤quadIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和quadOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。也等于poly。指数（2）。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric sinusoidal easing; scales sinIn for t in [0, 0.5] and sinOut for t in [0.5, 1].
trans-unit.target: 对称正弦曲线缓和；秤sinIn用于吨在[0，0.5]和sinOut用于吨在[0.5，1]。

trans-unit.target: 目录

trans-unit.source: Tasks can only be deferred before queue.await or queue.awaitAll is called. If a task is deferred after then, an error is thrown. If the task is not a function, an error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 只能在调用队列 .await或队列 .awaitAll之前推迟任务。如果此后推迟执行任务，则会引发错误。如果任务不是函数，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Tasks can take optional arguments. For example, here’s how to configure the delay before hello and provide a name:

trans-unit.source: The .parents([

The dayinterval is one of several provided by d3-time. Each interval represents a conventional unit of time—hours, weeks, months, etc.—and has methods to calculate boundary dates. For example, d3.timeDay computes midnight (typically 12:00 AM local time) of the corresponding day. In addition to rounding and counting, intervals can also be used to generate arrays of boundary dates. For example, to compute each Sunday in the current month:
trans-unit.target: 该天间隔是由D3-时间提供了若干之一。每个间隔表示的时间的常规单元小时，周，月，等等 -和具有的方法来计算边界日期。例如，d3.timeDay计算相应日期的午夜（通常是当地时间上午12:00）。除了四舍五入和计数外，间隔还可以用于生成边界日期数组。例如，要计算当月的每个星期日：

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-positioning forces push nodes towards a desired position along the given dimension with a configurable strength. The radial force is similar, except it pushes nodes towards the closest point on a given circle. The strength of the force is proportional to the one-dimensional distance between the node’s position and the target position. While these forces can be used to position individual nodes, they are intended primarily for global forces that apply to all (or most) nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该X -和ÿ -positioning力推动节点朝向沿与可配置的强度给定的尺寸的期望的位置。的径向力是类似的，除了它推向上的给定圆的最近点的节点。力的强度与节点位置和目标位置之间的一维距离成比例。虽然这些力可用于定位单个节点，但它们主要用于施加于所有（或大多数）节点的全局力。

trans-unit.source: The Mollweide projection interrupted into two (equal-area) hemispheres.
trans-unit.target: 所述Mollweide投影中断成两个（等面积）半球。

trans-unit.source: The easing, delay and duration of a transition is configurable. For example, a per-element delay can be used to stagger the reordering of elements, improving perception. See Animated Transitions in Statistical Data Graphics for recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 过渡的缓动，延迟和持续时间是可配置的。例如，每个元素的延迟可用于错开元素的重新排序，从而改善感知度。有关建议，请参见统计数据图形中的动画过渡。

trans-unit.source: The d3.range method no longer makes an elaborate attempt to avoid floating-point error when step is not an integer. The returned values are strictly defined as start + i * step, where i is an integer. (Learn more about floating point math.) d3.range returns the empty array for infinite ranges, rather than throwing an error.
trans-unit.target: 当step不是整数时，d3.range方法不再作详尽的尝试来避免浮点错误。返回值严格定义为start + i * step，其中i是整数。（了解有关浮点数学的更多信息。）d3.range返回无限范围的空数组，而不是引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The d3.map constructor also follows the standard array accessor argument pattern.
trans-unit.target: 所述d3.map构造也遵循标准阵列存取参数图案。

trans-unit.source: The nest.map method now always returns a d3.map instance. For a plain object, use nest.object instead. When used in conjunction with nest.rollup, nest.entries now returns {key, value} objects for the leaf entries, instead of {key, values}. This makes nest.rollup easier to use in conjunction with hierarchies, as in this Nest Treemap example.
trans-unit.target: 该巢 .MAP方法现在总是返回d3.map实例。对于普通对象，请改用nest .object。当与nest .rollup结合使用时，nest .entries现在返回叶子条目的{key，value}对象，而不是{key，values}。这使得巢 .rollup更容易结合使用的层次结构，如本巢树形例子。

trans-unit.source: The d3.set constructor now accepts an existing set for making a copy. If you pass an array to d3.set, you can also pass a value accessor. This accessor takes the standard arguments: the current element (d), the index (i), and the array (data), with this undefined. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该d3.set构造函数现在接受了制作副本的现有集合。如果将数组传递给d3.set，则还可以传递值访问器。此访问器采用标准参数：当前元素（d），索引（i）和数组（data），但未定义。例如：

trans-unit.source: The rgb.brighter method no longer special-cases black. This is a multiplicative operator, defining a new color r′, g′, b′ where r′ = r × pow(0.7, k), g′ = g × pow(0.7, k) and b′ = b × pow(0.7, k); a brighter black is still black.
trans-unit.target: 该RGB .brighter方法不再是特殊情况下的黑色。这是一个乘法运算符，定义了新的颜色r '，g '，b '，其中r '= r × pow（0.7，k），g '= g × pow（0.7，k）和b '= b × pow（ 0.7，k）;较亮的黑色仍然是黑色。

trans-unit.source: The dispatch.on method now accepts multiple typenames, allowing you to add or remove listeners for multiple events simultaneously. For example, to send both foo and bar events to the same listener:
trans-unit.target: 现在，dispatch .on方法接受多个类型名，使您可以同时添加或删除多个事件的侦听器。例如，要将foo和bar事件发送到同一侦听器：

trans-unit.source: The dsv.parse method now exposes the column names and their input order as data.columns. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该DSV .parse方法现在公开的列名和它们的输入顺序数据 .columns。例如：

trans-unit.source: The d3.formatPrefix method has been changed. Rather than returning an SI-prefix string, it returns an SI-prefix format function for a given specifier and reference value. For example, to format thousands:
trans-unit.target: 该d3.formatPrefix方法已经改变。它不返回SI前缀字符串，而是返回给定说明符和参考值的SI前缀格式函数。例如，格式化成千上万：

trans-unit.source: The d3.interpolate method no longer delegates to d3.interpolators, which has been removed; its behavior is now defined by the library. It is now slightly faster in the common case that b is a number. It only uses d3.interpolateRgb if b is a valid CSS color specifier (and not approximately one). And if the end value b is null, undefined, true or false, d3.interpolate now returns a constant function which always returns b.
trans-unit.target: 该d3.interpolate方法不再委托给d3.interpolators，这已被移除; 它的行为现在由库定义。在通常情况下，b是一个数字，现在速度稍快一些。如果b是有效的CSS颜色说明符（而不是大约一个），则仅使用d3.interpolateRgb。并且如果最终值b为null，undefined，true或false，则d3.interpolate现在将返回一个常量函数，该函数始终返回b。

trans-unit.source: The d3.path serializer implements the CanvasPathMethods API, allowing you to write code that can render to either Canvas or SVG. For example, given some code that draws to a canvas:
trans-unit.target: 该d3.path串行实现CanvasPathMethods API，允许你编写的代码，可以使要么帆布或SVG。例如，给出一些绘制到画布上的代码：

trans-unit.source: The d3.csv and d3.tsv methods for loading files of the corresponding formats have not been renamed, however! Those are defined in d3-request.There’s no longer a d3.dsv method, which served the triple purpose of defining a DSV formatter, a DSV parser and a DSV requestor; instead, there’s just d3.dsvFormat which you can use to define a DSV formatter and parser. You can use request.response to make a request and then parse the response body, or just use d3.text.
trans-unit.target: 但是，用于重载相应格式文件的d3.csv和d3.tsv方法尚未重命名！这些已在d3-request中定义。不再有d3.dsv方法，该方法用于定义DSV格式化程序，DSV解析器和DSV请求程序的三重目的；相反，只有d3.dsvFormat可用于定义DSV格式化程序和解析器。您可以使用request .response发出请求，然后解析响应正文，或者仅使用d3.text。

trans-unit.source: The d3.request, d3.text and d3.xml methods no longer take an optional mime type as the second argument; use request.mimeType instead. For example:
trans-unit.target: 的d3.request，d3.text和d3.xml方法不再采取可选的mime类型作为第二个参数; 使用request .mimeType代替。例如：

trans-unit.source: The ordinal scale constructor now takes an optional range for a shorter alternative to ordinal.range. This is especially useful now that the categorical color scales have been changed to simple arrays of colors rather than specialized ordinal scale constructors:
trans-unit.target: 现在，ordinal scale构造函数采用一个可选范围，以替代ordinal .range。由于分类色标已更改为简单的颜色数组，而不是专用的有序标尺构造函数，因此这特别有用：

trans-unit.source: The selection.data method has been changed slightly with respect to duplicate keys. In 3.x, if multiple data had the same key, the duplicate data would be ignored and not included in enter, update or exit; in 4.0 the duplicate data is always put in the enter selection. In both 3.x and 4.0, if multiple elements have the same key, the duplicate elements are put in the exit selection. Thus, 4.0’s behavior is now symmetric for enter and exit, and the general update pattern will now produce a DOM that matches the data even if there are duplicate keys.
trans-unit.target: 对于重复键，选择 .data方法已稍作更改。在3.x中，如果多个数据具有相同的键，则重复的数据将被忽略并且不包含在enter，update或exit中；在4.0中，重复数据始终放在回车选择中。在3.x和4.0中，如果多个元素具有相同的键，则将重复的元素放入退出选择中。因此，4.0的行为现在对于进入和退出是对称的，并且即使存在重复的键，常规更新模式现在也会产生一个与数据匹配的DOM。

trans-unit.source: The selection.interrupt method now cancels all scheduled transitions on the selected elements, in addition to interrupting any active transition. When transitions are interrupted, any resources associated with the transition are now released immediately, rather than waiting until the transition starts, improving performance. (See also timer.stop.) The new d3.interrupt method is an alternative to selection.interrupt for quickly interrupting a single node.
trans-unit.target: 该选择 .interrupt方法现在取消对所选择的元件的所有预定的转换，除了中断任何活动的转变。当转换被中断时，与转换相关联的所有资源现在都会立即释放，而不是等到转换开始后才可以提高性能。 （另请参见timer .stop。）新的d3.interrupt方法是选择 .interrupt的替代方法，用于快速中断单个节点。

trans-unit.source: The selection.transition method now takes an optional transition instance which can be used to synchronize a new transition with an existing transition. (This change is discussed further in What Makes Software Good?) For example:
trans-unit.target: 现在，selection .transition方法采用一个可选的过渡实例，该实例可用于将新过渡与现有过渡进行同步。 （此更改将在《使软件变得更好吗？》中进一步讨论。）例如：

trans-unit.source: The life cycle of a transition is now more formally defined and enforced. For example, attempting to change the duration of a running transition now throws an error rather than silently failing. The transition.remove method has been fixed if multiple transition names are in use: the element is only removed if it has no scheduled transitions, regardless of name. The transition.ease method now always takes an easing function, not a string. When a transition ends, the tweens are invoked one last time with t equal to exactly 1, regardless of the associated easing function.
trans-unit.target: 现在，可以更正式地定义和实施过渡的生命周期。例如，现在尝试更改正在运行的过渡的持续时间会引发错误，而不是无提示地失败。该过渡卸下摆臂，如果没有庆典过渡元素仅取出不管名称：方法已得到修复，如果出现了多种过渡名字都在使用。现在，transition .ease方法始终采用缓动函数，而不是字符串。过渡结束时，无论关联的缓动函数如何，最后一次调用补间时，t等于1。

trans-unit.source: The voronoi.polygons and diagram.polygons now require an extent; there is no longer an implicit extent of ±1e6. The voronoi.links, voronoi.triangles, diagram.links and diagram.triangles are now affected by the clip extent: as the Delaunay is computed as the dual of the Voronoi, two sites are only linked if the clipped cells are touching. To compute the Delaunay triangulation without respect to clipping, set the extent to null.
trans-unit.target: 该沃罗诺伊 .polygons和图 .polygons现在需要程度 ;隐含范围不再为±1e6。该沃罗诺伊 .links，沃罗诺伊 .triangles，图 .links和图 .triangles现在受夹程度：作为德洛奈被计算为双重维诺，如果限幅的细胞接触两个站点仅链接。若要在不考虑裁剪的情况下计算Delaunay三角剖分，请将范围设置为null。

trans-unit.source: The Bottomley projection “draws lines of latitude as concentric circular arcs, with arc lengths equal to their lengths on the globe, and placed symmetrically and equally spaced across the vertical central meridian.”
trans-unit.target: 的Bottomley的投影 “绘制纬度同心圆弧的线，弧长等于其在地球上的长度，并对称地放置和等距间隔的整个垂直中央子午线”。

trans-unit.source: The circumcenters of the Delaunay triangles as a Float64Array [cx0, cy0, cx1, cy1, …]. Each contiguous pair of coordinates cx, cy is the circumcenter for the corresponding triangle. These circumcenters form the coordinates of the Voronoi cell polygons.
trans-unit.target: 该外心的德洛奈三角形的作为Float64Array [ CX0，CY0，CX1，CY1，...]。每个相邻的坐标对cx，cy是相应三角形的外接中心。这些外心形成Voronoi细胞多边形的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The Natural Earth II projection. Compared to Natural Earth, it is slightly taller and rounder.
trans-unit.target: 在自然的大地II投影。与自然地球相比，它略高且更圆。

trans-unit.source: The Natural Earth projection is a pseudocylindrical projection designed by Tom Patterson. It is neither conformal nor equal-area, but appealing to the eye for small-scale maps of the whole world.
trans-unit.target: 在自然地球投影是伪圆柱投影由汤姆·帕特森设计。它既不是保形的也不是等面积的，而是吸引了全世界的小比例地图。

trans-unit.source: The universal selector, *, selects all descendant elements. If you also want to interrupt the G element itself:
trans-unit.target: 在通用选择， * ，选择所有子孙元素。如果您还想中断G元素本身：

trans-unit.source: The loximuthal projection is “characterized by the fact that loxodromes (rhumb lines) from one chosen central point (the intersection of the central meridian and central latitude) are shown as straight lines, correct in azimuth from the center, and are ‘true to scale’… It is neither an equal-area projection nor conformal.”
trans-unit.target: 垂线投影的特征是“从一个选定的中心点（中心子午线与中心纬度的交点）开始的轨迹（大黄线）显示为直线，从中心的方位角正确，并且'按比例绘制” “……它既不是等面积投影也不是保形的。”

trans-unit.source: The two standard parallels that define the map layout in conic projections.
trans-unit.target: 这两个标准平行线定义了圆锥投影中的地图布局。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback pattern is very common in Node.js, so Queue works directly with many Node APIs. For example, to stat two files concurrently:
trans-unit.target: 在异步回调格局是Node.js的很常见，所以排队直接与许多节点API。例如，要同时统计两个文件：

trans-unit.source: The % sign indicating a directive may be immediately followed by a padding modifier:
trans-unit.target: 指示指令的 % 符号可以紧随其后的是padding修饰符：

trans-unit.source: The b, o, d and x directives now round to the nearest integer, rather than returning the empty string for non-integers:
trans-unit.target: 现在， b ， o ， d 和 x 指令舍入到最接近的整数，而不是为非整数返回空字符串：

trans-unit.source: The c directive is now for character data (i.e., literal strings), not for character codes. The is useful if you just want to apply padding and alignment and don’t care about formatting numbers. For example, the infamous left-pad (as well as center- and right-pad!) can be conveniently implemented as:

trans-unit.source: The compare function takes two arguments a and b, each elements from the input data array. If the arc for a should be before the arc for b, then the comparator must return a number less than zero; if the arc for a should be after the arc for b, then the comparator must return a number greater than zero; returning zero means that the relative order of a and b is unspecified. For example, to sort arcs by their associated name:

trans-unit.source: The container of a drag gesture determines the coordinate system of subsequent drag events, affecting event.x and event.y. The element returned by the container accessor is subsequently passed to d3.mouse or d3.touch, as appropriate, to determine the local coordinates of the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 拖动手势的容器确定后续拖动事件的坐标系，从而影响事件 .x和事件 .y。随后，将容器访问器返回的元素适当地传递到d3.mouse或d3.touch，以确定指针的本地坐标。

trans-unit.source: The data is specified for each group in the selection. If the selection has multiple groups (such as d3.selectAll followed by selection.selectAll), then data should typically be specified as a function. This function will be evaluated for each group in order, being passed the group’s parent datum (d, which may be undefined), the group index (i), and the selection’s parent nodes (nodes), with this as the group’s parent element. For example, to create an HTML table from a matrix of numbers:
trans-unit.target: 该数据被指定为每个组中选择。如果选择具有多个组（例如d3.selectAll之后是selection .selectAll），则通常应将数据指定为一个函数。该函数将按顺序评估每个组，并传递给组的父基准（d，可能是未定义的），组索引（i）和选择的父节点（node），以此作为组的父元素。例如，从数字矩阵创建HTML表：

trans-unit.source: The event object also exposes the event.on method.

trans-unit.source: The event.active field is useful for detecting the first start event and the last end event in a sequence of concurrent drag gestures: it is zero when the first drag gesture starts, and zero when the last drag gesture ends.
trans-unit.target: 的事件。活跃字段是用于检测第一开始事件和并发拖拽手势的一个序列中的最后结束事件有用：它是零的第一拖动手势开始，并且最后一个拖动手势结束时为零时。

trans-unit.target: 的地板函数采用一个单独的日期作为参数和轮下来到最近的间隔的边界。

trans-unit.source: The histogram.range method has been renamed histogram.domain for consistency with scales. The histogram.bins method has been renamed histogram.thresholds, and no longer accepts an upper value: n thresholds will produce n + 1 bins. If you specify a desired number of bins rather than thresholds, d3.histogram now uses d3.ticks to compute nice bin thresholds. In addition to the default Sturges’ formula, D3 now implements the Freedman-Diaconis rule and Scott’s normal reference rule.
trans-unit.target: 该直方图 .range方法已更名直方图。域与尺度的一致性。该直方图 .bins方法已被重命名直方图 .thresholds，并且不再接受的上限值：Ñ阈值将产生Ñ + 1二进制位。如果您指定所需的箱数而不是阈值，则d3.histogram现在将使用d3.ticks计算漂亮的箱体阈值。除了默认的“斯特吉斯”公式外，D3现在还实现了Freedman-Diaconis规则和Scott的正常参考规则。

trans-unit.source: The map.forEach and set.forEach methods have been renamed to map.each and set.each respectively. The order of arguments for map.each has also been changed to value, key and map, while the order of arguments for set.each is now value, value and set. This is closer to ES6 map.forEach and set.forEach. Also like ES6 Map and Set, map.set and set.add now return the current collection (rather than the added value) to facilitate method chaining. New map.clear and set.clear methods can be used to empty collections.
trans-unit.target: 该地图 .forEach和集 .forEach方法已被更名为映射。每个和设置。每次分别。map .each 的参数顺序也已更改为value，key和map，而set .each 的参数顺序现在为value，value和set。这更接近ES6 映射 .forEach并设置 .forEach。也像ES6 Map and Set一样，映射 .set和set.add现在返回当前集合（而不是增加的值），以方便方法链接。新的map .clear和set .clear方法可用于清空集合。

trans-unit.source: The offset function takes a date and an integer step as arguments and advances the specified date by the specified number of boundaries; the step may be positive, negative or zero.
trans-unit.target: 该偏移量函数采用一个日期和一个整数的步骤作为参数，并前进通过边界的指定数量的指定日期; 该步长可以为正，负或零。

trans-unit.source: The radius accessor is invoked for each node in the simulation, being passed the node and its zero-based index. The resulting number is then stored internally, such that the target radius of each node is only recomputed when the force is initialized or when this method is called with a new radius, and not on every application of the force.
trans-unit.target: 的半径访问器为每个节点在该模拟中，正在传递的节点和它的基于零的索引。然后将所得的数字存储在内部，以便仅在初始化力或使用新的半径调用此方法时才重新计算每个节点的目标半径，而不是在每次施加力时都重新计算。

trans-unit.source: The subject of a drag gesture represents the thing being dragged. It is computed when an initiating input event is received, such as a mousedown or touchstart, immediately before the drag gesture starts. The subject is then exposed as event.subject on subsequent drag events for this gesture.
trans-unit.target: 拖动手势的主题表示被拖动的物体。在拖动手势开始之前立即收到启动输入事件（例如，鼠标按下或触摸启动）时进行计算。然后，在此手势的后续拖动事件中，对象作为事件主体暴露。

trans-unit.source: The update and enter selections are returned in data order, while the exit selection preserves the selection order prior to the join. If a key function is specified, the order of elements in the selection may not match their order in the document; use selection.order or selection.sort as needed. For more on how the key function affects the join, see A Bar Chart, Part 2 and Object Constancy.
trans-unit.target: 该更新和输入选择在数据顺序返回，而退出选择保留选择顺序之前加入。如果指定了键功能，则所选元素的顺序可能与文档中的顺序不匹配；根据需要使用selection .order或selection .sort。有关键功能如何影响联接的更多信息，请参见条形图，第2部分和对象常量。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinate for each data point are computed using density.x and density.y. In addition, density.weight indicates the relative contribution of each data point (default 1). The generated contours are only accurate within the estimator’s defined size.
trans-unit.target: 使用密度 .x和密度 .y计算每个数据点的x和y坐标。此外，密度。重量表示每个数据点（默认为1）的相对贡献。生成的轮廓仅在估计器的定义大小内是准确的。

trans-unit.source: The x-acccessor is used to derive the x-coordinate of data when adding to and removing from the tree. It is also used when finding to re-access the coordinates of data previously added to the tree; therefore, the x- and y-accessors must be consistent, returning the same value given the same input.
trans-unit.target: 的X -acccessor被用于导出X时数据的-协调添加到和移除从树。查找重新访问先前添加到树中的数据的坐标时，也可以使用它。因此，x-和y-访问器必须一致，并在给定相同输入的情况下返回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The x-accessor is invoked for each node in the simulation, being passed the node and its zero-based index. The resulting number is then stored internally, such that the target x-coordinate of each node is only recomputed when the force is initialized or when this method is called with a new x, and not on every application of the force.
trans-unit.target: 的X -accessor被调用用于每个节点在该模拟中，正在传递的节点和它的基于零的索引。然后将所得的数字存储在内部，以便仅在初始化力或使用新x调用此方法时才重新计算每个节点的目标x 坐标，而不是在每次施加力时都重新计算。

trans-unit.source: The y-acccessor is used to derive the y-coordinate of data when adding to and removing from the tree. It is also used when finding to re-access the coordinates of data previously added to the tree; therefore, the x- and y-accessors must be consistent, returning the same value given the same input.
trans-unit.target: 该ÿ -acccessor被用于导出ÿ时数据的-协调添加到和移除从树。查找重新访问先前添加到树中的数据的坐标时，也可以使用它。因此，x-和y-访问器必须一致，并在给定相同输入的情况下返回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The y-accessor is invoked for each node in the simulation, being passed the node and its zero-based index. The resulting number is then stored internally, such that the target y-coordinate of each node is only recomputed when the force is initialized or when this method is called with a new y, and not on every application of the force.
trans-unit.target: 该ÿ -accessor被调用用于每个节点在该模拟中，正在传递的节点和它的基于零的索引。然后将所得的数字存储在内部，以便仅在初始化力或使用新y调用此方法时才重新计算每个节点的目标y坐标，而不是在每次施加力时都重新计算。

trans-unit.source: The zero (0) option enables zero-padding; this implicitly sets fill to 0 and align to =. The width defines the minimum field width; if not specified, then the width will be determined by the content. The comma (,) option enables the use of a group separator, such as a comma for thousands.
trans-unit.target: 的零（ 0 ）选项允许零填充;这个隐式地设置填充到 0 和对准到 = 。该宽度限定了最小字段宽度;如果未指定，则宽度将由内容确定。的逗号（ , ）选项允许使用一组分离器，如成千上万逗号。

trans-unit.source: The cluster layout produces dendrograms: node-link diagrams that place leaf nodes of the tree at the same depth. Dendograms are typically less compact than tidy trees, but are useful when all the leaves should be at the same level, such as for hierarchical clustering or phylogenetic tree diagrams.
trans-unit.target: 的群集布局产生树状图：节点链接图表，在同一深度的树的地方叶节点。树状图通常不如整齐的树紧凑，但是当所有叶子都应处于同一水平时（例如，层次聚类或系统树图），则树状图很有用。

trans-unit.source: The link shape generates a smooth cubic Bézier curve from a source point to a target point. The tangents of the curve at the start and end are either vertical, horizontal or radial.
trans-unit.target: 的链接形状生成从源点到目标点的平滑三次Bezier曲线。曲线在起点和终点的切线可以是垂直，水平或径向。

trans-unit.source: The partition layout produces adjacency diagrams: a space-filling variant of a node-link tree diagram. Rather than drawing a link between parent and child in the hierarchy, nodes are drawn as solid areas (either arcs or rectangles), and their placement relative to other nodes reveals their position in the hierarchy. The size of the nodes encodes a quantitative dimension that would be difficult to show in a node-link diagram.
trans-unit.target: 所述分区布局产生邻接的图：节点链接树图的空间填充的变体。节点不是绘制层次结构中父级和子级之间的链接，而是绘制为实心区域（弧形或矩形），并且它们相对于其他节点的位置揭示了它们在层次结构中的位置。节点的大小编码一个量化的维，这在节点链接图中很难显示。
